app/third_party/jupyterhub

\n
1-click deploy

or

2-click deploy

JupyterHub builder/updater and daemon installer/updater.

JupyterHub brings the power of notebooks to groups of users. It gives users access to computational environments and resources without burdening the users with installation and maintenance tasks. Users - including students, researchers, and data scientists - can get their work done in their own workspaces on shared resources which can be managed efficiently by system administrators.

JupyterHub runs in the cloud or on your own hardware, and makes it possible to serve a pre-configured data science environment to any user in the world. It is customizable and scalable, and is suitable for small and large teams, academic courses, and large-scale infrastructure.

Local and image-creation usage

  • UNIX
  • Windows
$ # Replace `$(pwd)` if not in the 'libscript' directory or a generated one.
$ export LIBSCRIPT_ROOT_DIR="$(pwd)"
$ # `export` any variables now (see below for variable docs). Then:
$ # Set script location:
$ export SCRIPT_NAME="${LIBSCRIPT_ROOT_DIR}"'/app/third_party/jupyterhub/setup.sh'
$ . "${SCRIPT_NAME}"
> :: Replace `%cd%` if not in the 'libscript' directory or a generated one.
> SET "LIBSCRIPT_ROOT_DIR=%cd%"
> :: `SET` any variables now (see below for variable docs). Then:
> :: Set script location:
> SET SCRIPT_NAME="%LIBSCRIPT_ROOT_DIR%\app\third_party\jupyterhub\setup.cmd"
> CALL "%SCRIPT_NAME%"

Objects

1-click deploy

2-click deploy
  • jupyterhub third-party vars (root object)

## jupyterhub third-party vars

jupyterhub third-party vars that can be set

jupyterhub third-party vars Properties

Type Description Required
JUPYTERHUB_SERVICE_USER string Username to use for the install + daemon serve (creates user if nonexistent) No
JUPYTERHUB_IP string IP address to server from No
JUPYTERHUB_PORT string IP port to server from No
JUPYTERHUB_NOTEBOOK_DIR string Notebook directory (creates if nonexistent) No
JUPYTERHUB_VENV string Python virtualenv to use (creates if nonexistent) No
JUPYTERHUB_PASSWORD string Preferably (hashed+salted argon2) password to use No

Additional properties are allowed.

jupyterhub third-party vars.JUPYTERHUB_SERVICE_USER

Username to use for the install + daemon serve (creates user if nonexistent)

  • Type: string
  • Required: No

jupyterhub third-party vars.JUPYTERHUB_IP

IP address to server from

  • Type: string
  • Required: No

jupyterhub third-party vars.JUPYTERHUB_PORT

IP port to server from

  • Type: string
  • Required: No

jupyterhub third-party vars.JUPYTERHUB_NOTEBOOK_DIR

Notebook directory (creates if nonexistent)

  • Type: string
  • Required: No

jupyterhub third-party vars.JUPYTERHUB_VENV

Python virtualenv to use (creates if nonexistent)

  • Type: string
  • Required: No

jupyterhub third-party vars.JUPYTERHUB_PASSWORD

Preferably (hashed+salted argon2) password to use

  • Type: string
  • Required: No
